code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:white m sailor aged 31 yrs with C/O mild difficulty seeing colors, especially blue, mild constriction in eye field and mild vision deterioration, especially in the dark. o:Height 76 in, Weight 207 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments, and ordered refractive error testing.

s:patient presents with mild constriction in eye field for about 6 weeks. pt is a male sailor aged 31 ys. he has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 75 in, Weight 200 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments, and ordered Visual Field Testing.
Do not IV Fluid and Support
